text: Sphingomonas polyaromaticivorans is a Gram-negative, aerobic, short-rod-shaped and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from water from the Botan Oil Port in Xiamen in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Sphingomonas polyaromaticivorans has the ability to degrade hydrocarbon compounds. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas polyaromaticivorans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase polyaromaticivorans Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Sphingomonas polyaromaticivorans
